Package org.cdnomlqko.jglutil.data

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Bufferable
    An object that can be written into a buffer
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Camera
    This class holds the properties of a camera
    Light
    This class holds the properties of a light, made to be passed to shaders.
    Material
    This class holds the properties of a material for an object, made to be passed to shaders.
    Renderable
    An object that can be rendered by the Renderer.
    Scene  
    Texture2D
    RGBA 2D texture
    Transformation
    This class contains transformation data in 3d: position, rotation, scale and maintains a matrix that does these transformations - worldMatrix
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Light.Type
    This class holds the type of a light
